prerequisite: Only a hexblade can take this paragon path.
name: Legendary Hexblade
text: You focus your study and arcane practice on your pact, uncovering its mysteries and mastering the magic it offers.

features.hexblade'sAction(11thLevel): You gain a paragon path feature associated with your pact
features.pactAspect(11thLevel): You gain a paragon path feature associated with your pact
features.pactCurse(11thLevel): You gain a paragon path power associated with your pact
